title: Type for recreating a cast iron fireback
content:
I do have a rather poor reference to start from. None the less, I could use some suggestions for fonts which nearly approximate the type originaly cast into this iron fireback.

Thanks in advance for the help.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [typesample.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023063906/http:/typophile.com/files/typesample_0.jpg) | 104.58 KB |
author: gene ullery-smith

comments.content: I love the fact that it has a date… always handy.
Thanks so much for the guidance - its a big help.
